Kerbal Comics

Lol! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

'I too am only ze painting'

Dear lord.

You guys are awesome - this is so funny.

I have the best idea! A certain purveyor of pastel equines have made a nod to their fans - a ditzy character, at that. Now, I think that if you give even a teensy-weensy nod to the Roleplay forums, this would be THE BEST COMIC EVER!

Cheers!
Took a lobg time to load on phone but it definetly was worth it!

By the way, we used interior paint for the controls. It\'s water-soluble. That\'s why you\'re not allowed any fluids for the duration of the flight. Also, the absence of beverages saves a lot of weight.
I love these! Can\'t wait for the next one.

Eh, at the first glance (before reading through that German-ish text) I\'ve been thinking that an artist\'s got mistaken a bit when drawing a last picture....

Then I\'ve read the text and LOLed really hard))))
